mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice WHERE n_del = 0
SELECT notice.*, user.u_nickname FROM notice JOIN user ON user.u_no = notice.u_no WHERE n_del = 0 ORDER BY notice.n_no DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(n_title, n_content, u_no) VALUES(#{n_title}, #{n_content}, (SELECT u_no FROM user WHERE u_nickname=#{u_nickname}))
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET n_del = 1 WHERE n_no = #{n_no}
